item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "If you run from me, I will chase you, and I'll find you...." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Zac Hanson
item.description: "Love is like a good steak. It can be tough, but it still has its very juicy moments." -- Zac Hanson

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a badass, and I recognize that you, too, are a badass." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "You might want to lie down," Magnus advised. "I find that it helps when the crushing sense of horrible realization sets in." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Declarations of love amuse me. Especially when unrequited." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "It wouldn't be my move," Jace agreed. "First the candy and flowers, then the apology letters, then the ravenous demon hordes. In that order." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "You had every right to be. He raised his eyes to look at her and she was suddenly and strangely reminded of being four years old at the beach, crying when the wind came up and blew away the castle she had made. Her mother had told her she could make another one if she liked, but it hadn't stopped her crying because what she had thought was permanent was not permanent after all, but only made out of sand that vanished at the touch of wind and water." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Francois Rabelais. He was a poet. And his last words were "I go to seek a Great Perhaps." That's why I'm going. So I don't have to wait until I die to start seeking a Great Perhaps." -- John Green

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Saying 'I notice you're a nerd' is like saying, 'Hey, I notice that you'd rather be intelligent than be stupid, that you'd rather be thoughtful than be vapid, that you believe that there are things that matter more than the arrest record of Lindsay Lohan. Why is that?' In fact, it seems to me that most contemporary insults are pretty lame. Even 'lame' is kind of lame. Saying 'You're lame' is like saying 'You walk with a limp.' Yeah, whatever, so does 50 Cent, and he's done all right for himself." -- John Green

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't remember what happened. What you remember becomes what happened." -- John Green

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "It's possible to pretend I'm someone other than who I am, and if I pretend long enough, I can believe it." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What is the point of being alive if you don't at least try to do something remarkable?" -- John Green

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Because that was what you did with family when you'd been worried about them, you grabbed them and held on to them and told them how much they'd pissed you off, and it was okay, because no matter how angry you got, they still belonged to you." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Here your dreams are sweet and tomorrow brings them true, here is the place where I love you." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Holly Black
item.description: "We are, largely, who we remember ourselves to be. That's why habits are so hard to break. If we know ourselves to be liars, we expect not to tell the truth. If we think of ourselves as honest, we try harder." -- Holly Black

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Patrick Ness
Marcy Jo add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Our hearts, they need a mirror, Tessa. We see our better selves in the eyes of those who love us. And there is a beauty that brevity alone provides.” He dropped his gaze, then raised it to hers. “I would give you everything of myself,” he said. “I would give you more in two weeks than most men would give you in a lifetime." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Sherry Thomas
item.description: "You can live forever for me." -- Sherry Thomas

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Sherry Thomas
item.description: "Dreams are not real; but when you are inside a dream, it is real to you." -- Sherry Thomas

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Sherry Thomas
item.description: "As long as I live and breathe, I will be with you." -- Sherry Thomas

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Sherry Thomas
item.description: "The success of my rule does not rely on my ability to recite obscure Latin verse." -- Sherry Thomas

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Sherry Thomas
item.description: "You are asking me to give up everything for a cause that isn't mine. I don't want to be part of any revolution. I just want to live." -- Sherry Thomas

item.title: Marcy Jo add a quote by Sherry Thomas
item.description: "I live for you, and you alone." -- Sherry Thomas
